scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening,misty immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling,drifting spiritual particles,wide establishing shot,cinematic lighting,4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第4集:沙虫围袭·蛇妖突袭。

scenes.description: 巨龟车队在青罗沙漠中央急速收拢,数十辆龟车结成同心防线。

visual.composition: The giant tortoise convoy rapidly closes in at the heart of the Qingluo Desert,forming concentric defenses
visual.environment: Rapid convergence in the heart of the Qingluo Desert

scenes.prompt: A giant tortoise convoy rapidly closes ranks in the Qingluo Desert,dozens of tortoise carts forming concentric defensive rings
scenes.narration: 张奎一声令下，商队迅速集结，准备迎击沙虫兽群。

scenes.description: 五六十名巨狼骑士聚集在外圈,长枪狼牙棒列阵,蓝衫柳儿与血虎并肩。

visual.composition: Five to six dozen giant wolf riders gather on the outer ring,spears and wolf-fang maces arrayed
visual.character_pose: Riders clustered along the outer perimeter

scenes.prompt: Five to six dozen giant wolf riders mass on the outer ring,spears and wolf-fang maces arrayed,the blue-robed Liu'er standing beside the blood tiger
scenes.narration: 巨狼骑士成行列阵,柳儿立在血色猛虎旁,沉声指挥护卫撤回外圈。

scenes.description: 张奎吞下碧绿丹丸,身上黄光炸开,皮肤长出细密黄毛,瞳孔化为碧绿。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui swallows a jade-green pill as yellow light erupts from his body

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui swallows a jade-green pill,golden light detonates across him,fine yellow fur sprouts on his skin,pupils turning emerald
scenes.narration: 疤面大汉仰头吞下碧绿丹，身上黄光乍现，力量暴涨。

scenes.description: 张奎一磕狼腹,率先冲入黄尘,与骑士群组成黄雾洪流。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui heels his wolf,dives first into the yellow dust with the riders forming a swirling sand torrent
visual.character_pose: Cavalry merging into a yellow mist torrent

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui spurs his giant wolf,charges into the yellow dust,the riders merging into a surging sand-haze torrent
scenes.narration: 他脚下一磕巨狼腹，率先冲入黄尘，带领骑士迎敌。

scenes.description: 车队弓弩齐射,箭雨穿透沙幕,远景呈半透明光轨。

visual.composition: The convoy's bows and crossbows loose in unison,arrow rain piercing the sand curtain with translucent trails

scenes.prompt: The convoy unleashes a synchronized bow and crossbow volley,arrows slicing through the sand veil and leaving translucent trails
scenes.narration: 一声令下，车队弓弩齐发，箭雨如潮射向沙虫。

scenes.description: 第一批沙虫兽破尘而出,扁平身躯、巨口肉须凶猛扑击。

visual.composition: The first sand worms burst through the dust,flat bodies and fanged maws lunging ferociously

scenes.prompt: The leading sand worms tear out of the dust,flattened bodies with gaping maws and whipping tendrils lunging to attack
scenes.narration: 黄尘翻滚,数条丈许长的沙虫扑出,扁平巨口咆哮,肉须乱舞。

scenes.description: 龟背守卫高举刀盾,合力劈落扑来的巨虫。

visual.composition: Tortoise-back guards raise blades and shields,hacking down the lunging worms together
visual.environment: Guards on the tortoise shell lifting blades and shields

scenes.prompt: Guards atop the tortoise shell raise blades and shields,cleaving down the charging giant worms in unison
scenes.narration: 守卫们刀光连闪,将跃上的虫兽硬生生劈落,龟背震动连连。

scenes.description: 随着虫群增多,守卫出现伤亡,血迹溅满龟壳。

visual.composition: As the swarm thickens,guards fall and blood spatters across the tortoise shell

scenes.prompt: As the worm tide grows,guards fall wounded,blood splashing across the tortoise shell
scenes.narration: 虫潮如海,守卫终有失手,断臂残肢抛飞,龟壳被鲜血染红。

scenes.description: 韩立稳立龟背,神色从容,心中评估自身护身底牌。

visual.composition: Han Li stands steady on the tortoise shell,composed as he reviews his defensive trump cards

scenes.prompt: Han Li stands firm atop the tortoise shell,face composed while he sizes up his protective trump cards
scenes.narration: 韩立心念电转，快速思索对策，考虑如何应对眼前危机。

scenes.description: 香儿、筌儿、白衫少女抱旗现身龟背后方,决定布阵援助。

visual.composition: Xiang'er,Quan'er,and the white-robed girl appear behind the tortoise shell holding flags,choosing to deploy a formation
visual.environment: Rear section of the tortoise shell

scenes.prompt: Xiang'er,Quan'er,and the white-robed maiden arrive behind the tortoise shell holding flags,determined to support with a formation
scenes.narration: 香儿沉声安抚筌儿,三女各持小旗奔来,决意以阵法支撑护卫。

scenes.description: 三人摊出锦帕拼成阵图,白光线条在龟壳上亮起。

visual.composition: The trio spreads brocade cloths to form a formation diagram,white lines lighting up across the shell

scenes.prompt: Three girls unfurl brocade cloths into a formation map,white light tracing across the tortoise shell
scenes.narration: 锦帕一铺,阵纹互锁,淡白光芒自龟壳蔓延开来。

scenes.description: 三面小旗插入阵图,白光冲起,护卫们体力瞬间回涌。

visual.composition: Three small flags slot into the formation,white light surges upward and the guards regain stamina

scenes.prompt: Three small flags pierce the diagram,white light erupts upward and the guards' strength surges back
scenes.narration: 白光一荡,守卫疲态尽褪,挥刀如风,小回春阵让局势短暂逆转。

scenes.description: 韩立观察阵法,心中认出人界魔宗精元阵的简化,露出冷笑。

visual.composition: Han Li studies the formation,recognizing a simplified human-realm demon sect Jingyuan array

scenes.prompt: Han Li examines the formation,recognizing it as a simplified Jingyuan Array from the human realm demon sect and letting a cold smile show
scenes.narration: 韩立摸下巴轻笑，所谓小回春阵，不过是低阶恢复法阵而已。

scenes.description: 突然沙面炸裂,人首蛇身妖兽破土而出,乱发飞舞。

visual.composition: The sand surface explodes as a human-headed serpent-bodied demon bursts out,hair whipping wildly

scenes.prompt: The sands rupture as a human-headed,serpent-bodied demoness erupts upward,wild hair flaring
scenes.narration: 巨响掀飞沙浪,人首蛇身妖妇破土而出,焦黄乱发狂舞。

scenes.description: 蛇妖挥出三道黑芒,撞上三女撑起的灵霞光幕。

visual.composition: The serpent demon lashes out with three black beams colliding against the spiritual haze barrier the trio holds

scenes.prompt: The serpent demon hurls three streaks of black light that slam into the radiant barrier upheld by the three women
scenes.narration: 黑芒尖啸撞上灵霞，两者碰撞爆发出刺眼光芒，冲击波扩散开来。

scenes.description: 筌儿脱离光幕在空中失衡,韩立抛出石块击偏骨矛。

visual.composition: Quan'er tumbles outside the barrier midair while Han Li throws a stone to deflect the bone spear
visual.character_pose: Han Li hurling a stone to knock aside the bone spear

scenes.prompt: Quan'er loses balance outside the barrier,Han Li whips a stone that knocks the bone spear off course
scenes.narration: 石影破空,一声闷响,骨矛被硬生生撞偏,筌儿惊魂未定落回龟背。

scenes.description: 蛇妖暴怒,临走前掷出骨矛,韩立被击飞砸入货柜。

visual.composition: The enraged serpent demon hurls a bone spear while retreating,blasting Han Li into a cargo crate
visual.character_pose: Han Li sent flying into the crate

scenes.prompt: The serpent demon,furious,flings a bone spear while departing,blasting Han Li into the cargo chest
scenes.narration: 乌光命中,韩立被掀飞十余丈,砸进兵刃货柜,铁器哗啦一片。

scenes.description: 筌儿等三女冲上龟背查看,南歧子飘至注入灵力,韩立苦笑回应。

visual.composition: Quan'er and the other two rush onto the tortoise shell while Nanqizi drifts in to channel spiritual power
visual.character_pose: Han Li responds with a wry smile during the examination

scenes.prompt: Quan'er and the other girls dash up the tortoise shell to check on him as Nanqizi floats over to pour in spiritual power,Han Li answering with a wry smile
scenes.narration: 三女惊呼奔至，急忙查看韩立伤势，眼中满是担忧之色。

scenes.description: 张奎率剩余骑士拖着重伤返队,将金黄母虫头颅掷在地上。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui leads the surviving riders back,dragging their injuries while tossing the golden mother worm's head to the ground
visual.character_pose: Cavalry hauling their wounds back to camp

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui returns with the remaining riders,battered and bleeding,hurling the golden mother worm's severed head onto the ground
scenes.narration: 三十余骑浑身伤痕归来,张奎把巨虫首级抛地,欢呼声在防线内炸开

scenes.description: 车队暂驻半日,埋葬亡者、修补龟车,韩立被重新安置在车厢静养。

visual.composition: The convoy halts for half a day,burying the dead and repairing tortoise carts

scenes.prompt: The convoy pauses for half a day to bury the fallen,mend tortoise carts,and resettle Han Li inside a carriage to recuperate
scenes.narration: 商队驻扎半日，休整队伍，补充物资，准备继续前行。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Nighttime silhouette of an immortal city with spiritual light cascading from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky,immortal city silhouette,drifting spiritual particles
visual.fx: Falling motes of spiritual light with a fade-out

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending,night sky over an immortal city silhouette,spiritual particles drifting down,calm and mystical mood,wide shot,cinematic lighting,4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第5集即将开始。
